text: Khawaja Zaki Hasan, known as Zaki Hasan or K. Zaki Hasan, is a Pakistani physician, neuropsychiatrist and a former chairman of UNICEF (1979–1980).Officers of the UNICEF Executive Board 1946–2014, UNICEFExecutive Board, UNICEF He was professor of neuropsychiatry at the Jinnah Post Graduate Medical Centre in Karachi,Annual Report of the Director General Health (p. 60), Pakistan Health Division, 1973 and was particularly focused on the health and social aspects of children.Pakistan & Gulf Economist, vol. 12, issues 40–51, p. 69 He became a member of the UNICEF executive board at the international level in 1972 and served until 1981, for the last terms as first vice-chairman and finally as chairman. ==References== Category:Pakistani psychiatrists Category:Chairmen and Presidents of UNICEF Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Pakistani officials of the United Nations
title: Zaki Hasan
